title: Which song are these lyrics taken from: “Footsteps on the dance floor remind me baby of you, Teardrops in my eyes, next time I'll be true”? - Quora

response.answer_text: “Which song are these lyrics taken from: ‘Footsteps on the dance floor remind me baby of you, Teardrops in my eyes, next time I'll be true’?” These lyrics are from the song “Teardrops” by Womack and Womack (husband and wife singers/songwriters Cecil and Linda).
